pullrequest.title: Add mex wrappers for sim API

content.raw: I just tried the checker on `hxgz.c`. Here's the output in case there's something interesting to fix (there are a few long lines, spacing, etc.). We can ignore the casting comments. Totally optional. https://bitbucket.org/snippets/caguero/d7M4/hxgz-style-checker-output
